body:
Day 9 - Manga 148*
This one was pretty nice, I almost feel refreshed.
6/10.
weird art style and kinda hard to follow? 5/10 just cause there was nothing offensive

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. I’m sorry, I get paranoid very easily. So I’m just copy pasting it on older mangas. :(

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk , but I don't want to cause too many trouble too so I try select very old manga hope no one read this comment
